.LINK_EXPR_GET() Syntax Expression as C = .LINK_EXPR_GET() Description T he .LINK_EXPR_GET() method returns the expression that links two tables in a set. Example dim st as P dim tb as P st = set.open("invoice") tb = table.current(2) ? tb.link_expr_get() = "CUSTOMER_ID"
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Set Functions and Methods
